app_detail:
Kika Keyboard for Vivo is designed especially for Vivo users. With precise prediction and smart auto-correction, you can type faster. 3000+ emoji, funny stickers make you an attractive chatter. Decorate your keyboard with 1000+ themes, and set your own photo as the keyboard background. Itâ€™s 100% FREE!

ğŸ”®Prediction & Auto-CorrectionğŸ”®

Super intelligent next word prediction with AI technology speeds up your typing. Saving thousands of hours in total for all Indian friends every day! Protect yourself from embarrassing typo with our smart autocorrect. 

ğŸ˜‚Emoji KeyboardğŸ˜‚

Kika Keyboard for Vivo has tons of android emoji, emoticons, smiley faces, symbols, large emoji, animated emoji, festival emoji including Christmas emoji and Halloween emoji. A variety of female & male avatars with different expressions, movie gifs, movie Dialogs, popular scenes. Emoji art, Emoji symbols, photo emoji, talking emoji, messages emoji, Snapchat emoji. 

ğŸ‘»Sticker KeyboardğŸ‘»

You can use expressive, funny, colorful stickers for any conversation. To make chat refreshing. There are multiple stickers for every occasion. 

ğŸ‘•Theme KeyboardğŸ‘•

Kika Keyboard for Vivo is loaded with 1000+ themes to make your keyboard more funny and beautiful, including animated 3D Live themes. Funky skins to follow your mood and styles. 

ğŸ–¼Photo KeyboardğŸ–¼

Custom your keyboard using your own photos and other beautiful pictures. Just take or choose a photo from the gallery as your keyboard background. DIY your own theme. 

ğŸŒSocial Network CompatibleğŸŒ

It provides many good features to improve your experience in Whatsapp, Messenger, UC news, Facebook and other social networks. Help you to become a good chatter in Whatsapp.
